description: Newfon is a multilingual speech synthesizer that supports Russian, Ukrainian, Croatian, Polish and Serbian.
publisher: Sergey Shishmintsev, Alexy Sadovoi, Sergey A.K.A. Electrik, Kvark and other developers

translations.description: Newfon is a multilingual speech synthesizer that supports Russian, Ukrainian, Croatian, Polish and Serbian.
